column3: I have tested this locally, both for an in-tree and out-of-tree build.
Do we need to mention the Python 3 requirement somewhere?

> Do we need to mention the Python 3 requirement somewhere?

So the difference is that 'make check' now requires Python 3?
We could note it, thoough the same will be the case with #10044.

> So the difference is that 'make check' now requires Python 3?\n\nCorrect. That would also be the case for #10044 (see discussion here: https://botbot.me/freenode/bitcoin-core-dev/2017-03-16/?msg=82548466&page=5)
